description:
Presidential Secretariat - 08-624/1-Notify the Appointment to the President's staff as Additional  Secretaries to the President w.e.f. 01.05.2018. 
624/2-Notify the appointment Mrs. P. H. Colombage as an Acting Director with effect from 02.07.2018.
 624/3-Notify the appointment Mr. D. L .P. R. Abhayaratne as an Additional Secretary to the President w.e.f. 12.07.2018
624/4-Notify the Appointment Mr. E. G. S. Sisira Kumara as an Accountant to the President Staff w.e.f. 16.07.2018
